trans-unit.source: Create and Deploy the Trading Partner Agreement
trans-unit.target: Create and Deploy the Trading Partner Agreement

trans-unit.source: This part of the tutorial builds the EDI scenario.
trans-unit.target: This part of the tutorial builds the EDI scenario.

trans-unit.source: To build the EDI scenario, Northwind uses the <token>tpm_portal</token> to create trading partners and agreements.
trans-unit.target: To build the EDI scenario, Northwind uses the <token>tpm_portal</token> to create trading partners and agreements.

trans-unit.source: Contoso sends the sales order as an X12 message to the deployed agreement.
trans-unit.target: Contoso sends the sales order as an X12 message to the deployed agreement.

trans-unit.source: After receiving the X12 sales order, the deployed agreement processes the message, transforms it to the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> format expected by the EAI <token>bridge</token>, and routes it to the EAI <token>bridge</token> that you already deployed earlier.
trans-unit.target: After receiving the X12 sales order, the deployed agreement processes the message, transforms it to the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> format expected by the EAI <token>bridge</token>, and routes it to the EAI <token>bridge</token> that you already deployed earlier.

trans-unit.source: The <token>bridge</token> then inserts the message into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table using the SQL <token>lobrelay</token>.
trans-unit.target: The <token>bridge</token> then inserts the message into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table using the SQL <token>lobrelay</token>.

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section lists the steps to build and test the EDI scenario for the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section lists the steps to build and test the EDI scenario for the tutorial.
